EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Pivotal Breakfast_Sydney_Q119.1 Day Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See You at the Pivotal Breakfast Tomorrow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We look forward to seeing you at the Pivotal breakfast tomorrow- Driving Innovation with Application Transformation.
Date: Wednesday, 27th March 2019 Time: 8:30am - 10:15am (registration opens from 8am) Location: Pivotal Labs Sydney, Level 11/155 Clarence St, Sydney NSW 2000
Save the event in your calendar: https://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/Pivotal-Breakfast-Sydney-March19.ics
Featured Speakers:
- Lawrence Crowther, CTO APJ, Pivotal - Georgos Papanastasiou, Director Product Management, Easy to do Business, Service NSW - Anthony Clarke, AVP & Country Manager ANZ, Pivotal
Should you have any questions, please email us at communications-apj@pivotal.io.
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
